extends java.lang.Object
    * **** DISCLAIMER ***** * This is part of the AndroidNetworkTools library created by the user stealthcopter that can * be found here: https://github.com/stealthcopter/AndroidNetworkTools * We just integrated the source into our project to reuse part of their functionalities * ********************* Created by mat on 09/12/15.

    • Method Detail

      • onAddress

        public static Ping onAddress(java.lang.String address)
        Set the address to ping

        Note that a lookup is not performed here so that we do not accidentally perform a network request on the UI thread.

        Parameters:
        address - - Address to be pinged
        Returns:
        this object to allow chaining

      • setTimes

        public Ping setTimes(int noTimes)
        Set number of times to ping the address
        Parameters:
        noTimes - - number of times, 0 = continuous
        Returns:
        this object to allow chaining

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel a running ping

      • doPing

        public PingResult doPing()
                  throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Perform a synchronous ping and return a result, will ignore number of times.

        Note that this should be performed on a background thread as it will perform a network request

        Returns:
        - ping result
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - - if the host cannot be resolved

      • doPing

        public Ping doPing(Ping.PingListener pingListener)
        Perform an asynchronous ping
        Parameters:
        pingListener - - the listener to fire PingResults to.
        Returns:
        - this so we can cancel if needed
